lines.text: There's only one place - here. We kill him there as he comes around Holesovice Junction.
But he's heavily guarded all the time!
If it was peacetime, suddenly, now...what would you do?
I'd go out and buy a dress. A bright, red dress made of silk.
I'd see a good football match. Maybe get drunk afterwards.
I never did get that red dress.
And I never saw that football match.
